data.title: The Echo; The Breaker; The Shape of Snakes; Acid Row; Fox Evil; Disordered Minds by Minette Walters: Fine Cloth (1997) First edition.
data.meta_description: First edition. - Cloth - Macmillan 1997-2003, London - 1997 - Condition: Fine - Fine - Beautiful collection of six first impressions of Minette Walters's novels, each enclosed in its unclipped dust wrapper. Six first editions, first impressions of English crime writer Minette Walters's novels, often dealing with themes of isolation, rejection, marginalisation, justice, and revenge. Comprising the following titles: The Echo, The Breaker, The Shape of Snakes, Acid Row, Fox Evil, and Disordered Minds.Each complete with unclipped dust wrapper. In the original publisher's full cloth binding. Externally lovely. Only minor creasing to front board of 'Disordered Minds.' Dust wrappers unclipped and excellent. Internally, firmly bound. Pages bright and clean. Fine - The Echo; The Breaker; The Shape of Snakes; Acid Row; Fox Evil; Disordered Minds
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We send all our books on approval and we gladly accept returns for any reason in like condition within 30 days of purchase.

Shipping Terms:

Note For CoronaVirus. We post only via DHL and this is getting to everybody even in badly affected areas without problems and in good time, so please order with confidence. Also we do not ever charge extra for postage so what you see is what you pay. DHL gives next day delivery to places as far afield as New York.
